title: A Pinch of the Oscar's and a Handful of Remy Ma
itunes:title: A Pinch of the Oscar's and a Handful of Remy Ma
description:
Monday 2/27- Today on the show we spoke about the Oscar's that aired last night, but the main discussion was of course the Nicki Minaj diss that Remy Ma dropped over the weekend, which everyone is still raving about. In fact we opened up the phone lines to hear people's reaction and if they think Nicki Minaj will make a comeback. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the Oscars Academy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 2/27- Today on the show we spoke about the Oscar's that aired last night, but the main discussion was of course the Nicki Minaj diss that Remy Ma dropped over the weekend, which everyone is still raving about.
